Impacts - Class in com.hfych2.brickdestroy.model
This class is extracted from Wall of the original code.
This class defines the corresponding updates to be performed by the related components when impacts are detected.

impactWall() - Method in class com.hfych2.brickdestroy.model.Impacts
Checks the direction of impact to wall and call Ball.reverseY() on Brick.UP_IMPACT and Brick.DOWN_IMPACT or
call Ball.reverseX() on Brick.LEFT_IMPACT and Brick.RIGHT_IMPACT
Calls Brick.setImpact(Point2D, int) and passes in the first parameter as Ball.up or Ball.down or Ball.left or Ball.right depending on the direction of impact found using Brick.findImpact(Ball).

initialiseGameBoard() - Method in class com.hfych2.brickdestroy.model.GameBoard
Initialises GameBoard.wall, GameBoard.impacts, GameBoard.player.
Calls GameBoard.makeBall(Point2D) and sets the speed values.
Sets GameBoard.ballCount to 3 and GameBoard.ballLost to false.
Uses GameBoard.wall to call Wall.nextLevel() to initialise the first level.
